about: L√° Spa Ha Noi offers a tranquil escape where expert therapists provide a range of rejuvenating massages tailored to your needs. From the soothing touch of Aroma Massage to the invigorating experience of Deep Tissue Massage, each service promises to melt away stress and restore balance. With convenient amenities including showers and lockers, your relaxation journey begins the moment you step through the door.

about: At Dao‚Äôs Care we put people first. That is what drove us to establish our spa using a social business model. We employ visually impaired therapists and support the Red Dao ethnic minority. Any service you receive here will not only make you feel great, it will also contribute positively to the lives of others within our community. Dao‚Äôs Care offers various packages of spa massages for both relaxing and therapeutic purposes. Our massages are performed by special masseurs: the blind and visually-impaired.
